Name: Arrow
Caption:
Arrows used with small and long bows.
Unremarkable in any way, shape or form.

Name: Fire Arrow
Caption:
Arrow with the tip set alight.
Deals fire damage.

Name: Serpent Arrow
Caption:
Arrow carved to resemble a flying snake. Used in tandem with the Serpent Bow.

Loyal minions of the Formless Serpents, their fangs are daubed with deadly poison.

Name: Bone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Thin, whittled animal bone with feather fletchings
Caption:
Arrow whittled from thin animal bones. Craftable item.

The feather fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: St. Trina's Arrow
Caption:
Arrow carved to resemble a withered water lily. Afflicts targets with a powerful sleep effect.

Priests of St. Trina use these arrows to spread their teachings. The sweet oblivion of sleep can become quite the habit.

Name: Shattershard Arrow (Fletched)
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Rainbow Stone Arrow (Fletched)
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. Colored light shines at the point of impact.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Golden Arrow
Caption:
Carved arrows made in tandem with the Erdtree Bow. Deals holy damage.

Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death, and able to prevent them from rising again.

Name: Dwelling Arrow
Caption:
Arrow in which the spirits of small animals are thought to dwell. 
Deals magic damage.

Used by the master hunters of the ancestral followers.

Name: Bone Arrow
Info: Arrow whittled from thin animal bone
Caption:
Arrow whittled from thin animal bones. Craftable item.

Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

Name: Firebone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched animal bone arrow set alight when shot
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is set alight before firing. Deals fire damage.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Firebone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow set alight when shot
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is set alight before firing. Deals fire damage.

Craftable item.

Name: Poisonbone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched animal bone arrow with poison-daubed tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Poisonbone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow with poison-daubed tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison.

Craftable item.

Name: Sleepbone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched animal bone arrow with waterlily tincture tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. Afflicts targets with sleep.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Sleepbone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow with waterlily tincture tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. Afflicts targets with sleep.

Craftable item.

Name: Stormwing Bone Arrow
Info: Bone arrow fletched with stormhawk feathers
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones fletched with stormhawk feathers. Craftable item.

Flies enshrouded in storm winds, breaking enemy stances and guards with ease.

Name: Lightningbone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched animal bone arrow charged with lightning
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Lightningbone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow charged with lightning
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage.

Craftable item.

Name: Rainbow Stone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow tipped with Rainbow Stone shard
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. Colored light shines at the point of impact.

Craftable item.

Name: Shattershard Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow tipped with crystal shard
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

Craftable item.

Name: Spiritflame Arrow
Caption:
Arrow set alight with ghostflame before firing. Deals magic damage while also afflicting foes with frost.

Used by the Company of the Fallen Hawk, once ordered to explore the Eternal City.

Name: Magicbone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched bone arrow with glintstone tincture tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Magicbone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow with glintstone tincture tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage.

Craftable item.

Name: Haligbone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched bone arrow with gold tincture tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Haligbone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow with gold tincture tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage.

Craftable item.

Name: Bloodbone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched bone arrow with blood tincture tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. Afflicts targets with blood loss.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Bloodbone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow with blood tincture tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. Afflicts targets with blood loss.

Craftable item.

Name: Coldbone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched bone arrow with frozen tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a frozen tip. Afflicts targets with frost.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Coldbone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow with frozen tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a frozen tip. Afflicts targets with frost.

Craftable item.

Name: Rotbone Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Fletched bone arrow with rot-coated tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Rotbone Arrow
Info: Animal bone arrow with rot-coated tip
Caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot.

Craftable item.

Name: Great Arrow
Caption: A greatarrow as large as a spear for use with greatbows. Used by archers of monstrous strength employed by a lord's army.

Name: Golem's Great Arrow
Caption:
Greatarrow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. Used by the Guardian Golem.

This hefty arrow is enrobed in tempestuous winds, allowing it to break enemy stances and guards with ease.

Name: Golden Great Arrow
Caption:
Carved greatarrows made together with the Erdtree Greatbow. Deals holy damage.

Imbued with an oath-sworn incantation, which boosts the attack and defense of the archer and their nearby allies.

Name: Golem's Magic Arrow
Caption:
Greatarrow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. Imbued with its ancient magic.

Deals magic damage.

Name: Radahn's Spear
Caption:
Greatarrows used by General Radahn during the festival of combat. These are in fact the many spears with which he was stabbed by the Cleanrot Knights.

Imbued with Radahn's gravitational power.

Name: Bone Great Arrow (Fletched)
Info: Thick, whittled bone arrow with feather fletchings
Caption:
Greatarrow as large as a spear whittled from stout animal bones.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Name: Bone Great Arrow
Info: Thick, whittled animal bone arrow, large as a spear
Caption:
Greatarrow as large as a spear whittled from stout animal bones.

Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

Name: Bolt
Caption:
Ammunition used for crossbows.
A widespread, common type of bolt.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Caption:
Bolt tipped with a shard of Gravel Stone. Deals powerful lightning damage.

Used by worshippers of the ancient dragons.

Name: Perfumer's Bolt
Caption:
Bolt created with perfumer techniques. Used by nobles' guards and the like.

The point of impact explodes with sparks, dealing fire damage.

Name: Black-Key Bolt
Caption:
Bolts used in Crepus' Black-Key Crossbow, an assassin's tool of exquisite craftsmanship.

The intricate spiral tip bores deep, injecting scarlet rot far into the flesh of its target.

Name: Burred Bolt
Caption:
Bolt covered in thorns. One of the most horrific weapons used in the Shattering. Afflicts target with blood loss.

Difficult to remove once buried in flesh, causing appalling damage to the body.

Name: Meteor Bolt
Caption:
Enchanted work of craft made in tandem with the Full Moon Crossbow. The tip is embedded with glintstone.

Like a shooting star, these bolts leave a beautiful trail when fired. Deals magic damage.

Name: Explosive Bolt
Caption: Bolt tipped with a shard of Explosive Stone. Explodes on impact, dealing fire damage.

Name: Golden Bolt
Caption:
Bolt blessed with an incantation of the Erdtree. Deals powerful holy damage.

Once used by guards of the Capital.

Name: Lordsworn's Bolt
Caption:
Well-crafted bolt with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.

Deals more damage than its commonplace cousin.

Name: Bone Bolt
Info: Thin, whittled animal bone bolt
Caption:
Bolt carved from a thin animal bone. Craftable item.

Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

Name: Firebone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt set alight when shot
Caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is set alight before firing. Deals fire damage.

Craftable item.

Name: Lightningbone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt with lightning-imbued tip
Caption:
Bolt crafted from animal bone with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage.

Craftable item.

Name: Magicbone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt with glintstone tincture tip
Caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage.

Craftable item.

Name: Haligbone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt with gold tincture tip
Caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage.

Craftable item.

Name: Poisonbone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt with poison-coated tip
Caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison.

Craftable item.

Name: Bloodbone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt with blood tincture tip
Caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. Afflicts targets with blood loss.

Craftable item.

Name: Coldbone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt with frozen tip
Caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone with a frozen tip. Afflicts targets with frost.

Craftable item.

Name: Rotbone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt with rot-coated tip
Caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot.

Craftable item.

Name: Sleepbone Bolt
Info: Animal bone bolt with waterlily tincture tip
Caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a waterlily tincture. Afflicts targets with sleep.

Craftable item.

Name: Flaming Bolt
Caption:
Bolt with a fiercely burned tip. Deals powerful fire damage.

Used by survivors of Radahn's army to stave off the scarlet rot.

Name: Ballista Bolt
Caption: Greatbolt as large as a spear for use with Hand Ballista.

Name: Lightning Greatbolt
Caption:
Greatbolt tipped with a clump of Gravel Stone shards.

Deals powerful lightning damage.

Name: Explosive Greatbolt
Caption:
Greatbolt tipped with a clump of Explosive Stone shards.

Detonates a large explosion on impact, dealing fire damage.

Name: Bone Ballista Bolt
Info: Thick, whittled bone bolt, large as a spear
Caption:
Greatbolt as large as a spear carved from stout animal bones. Craftable item.

Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

Name: Throwing Dagger
Info: Throw at enemies to inflict damage
Caption:
Short dagger for throwing. It has no handguard.
The blade is polished, and its weight is expertly balanced.

Throw at enemies to deal damage.

This auxiliary weapon, used primarily to constrain an enemy's movements, can still be deadly in the right hands.

Name: Bone Dart
Info: Throw at enemies to inflict damage
Caption:
Animal bone sharpened into a knife for throwing.
Craftable item.

Throw at enemies to inflict damage.

Name: Poisonbone Dart
Info: Throw at enemies to inflict damage and build up poison
Caption:
Animal bone sharpened into a knife for throwing, with a poison-laced tip.
Craftable item.

Throw at enemies to inflict damage and build up poison.

Name: Kukri
Info: Throw at enemies to inflict damage and build up onset of blood loss
Caption:
A large knife used for throwing.
Its curved blade is sharp enough to slice flesh cleanly.

Throw at enemies to inflict damage and build up onset of blood loss.

This heavy throwing weapon is unsuitable for swift attacks, but is able to inflict heavy damage.

Name: Crystal Dart
Info: Uses FP. Throw to inflict magic damage.
Caption:
Throwing knife chiseled from impure crystal.
Craftable item.

Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to deal magic damage.

Long ago, it is said that a golem crafter employed a similar crystal tool.

Name: Fan Daggers
Info: Throw fanned-out knives at enemies to inflict damage
Caption:
A set of five throwing knives bundled together.
A concealed weapon cherished by the raptor assassins.

The thin knives fan out when thrown, dealing damage to the target.

Each knife deals paltry damage, but the wide range makes it suitable for constraining enemies.

Name: Ruin Fragment
Info: Material used for crafting items
Caption:
Stone fragment found near places where ruins have fallen from the sky.
Can be used for crafting, or simply for throwing at enemies.

These shards of stone are believed to have once been part of a temple in the sky.
They glow with a faint light from within.

Name: Explosive Stone
Info: Explodes when thrown, inflicting fire damage
Caption:
A small stone with a smoldering core.

Explodes when thrown at enemies, inflicting fire damage.

Miners employ these stones as tools for rock blasting, but have long forgotten how to craft them.

Name: Explosive Stone Clump
Info: Explodes when thrown together, inflicting fire damage
Caption:
A clump of small stones with smoldering cores.

Explodes when thrown together at enemies, inflicting fire damage.

Miners employ these stones as tools for rock blasting, but have long forgotten how to craft them.

Name: Poisoned Stone
Info: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of poison
Caption:
A small stone with a poison core.

Throw at enemies to cause buildup of poison.

Miners employ these stones as tools for pest extermination, but have long forgotten how to craft them.

Name: Poisoned Stone Clump
Info: Throw together to cause buildup of poison
Caption:
A clump of small stones with poison cores.

Throw together at enemies to cause buildup of poison.

Miners employ these stones as tools for pest extermination, but have long forgotten how to craft them.

Name: Ancestral Infant's Head
Info: Uses FP to spray spirit vapor
Caption:
Skull of a very young ancestral spirit. Just think how many sproutings It might bear.

Uses FP to spray spirit vapor inflicting magic damage.

The vapor becomes a temporary geyser which deals continuous damage to everything it touches until it disappears.

Name: Omen Bairn
Info: Uses FP to unleash wraiths that chase down foes
Caption:
Doll of a curseborn bairn.

Uses FP to unleash wraiths that chase down foes.

Omen babies have all their horns excised, causing most to perish. These fetishes are made to memorialize them.

"Please, don't hate me, or curse me. Please."

Name: Regal Omen Bairn
Info: Uses FP to unleash many wraiths that chase down foes
Caption:
Doll of a curseborn bairn from the Erdtree's royal line.

Uses FP to unleash many wraiths that chase down foes.

Omen babies born of royalty do not have their horns excised, but instead are kept underground, unbeknownst to anyone, imprisoned for eternity.

These memorial fetishes are fashioned in secret.

Name: Miranda's Prayer
Info: Uses FP to call down a deluge of light
Caption:
This statuette depicts a flower that preys on humans, posed in prayer.

Uses FP to call down a deluge of light.

Miranda, maiden of the Flower Crucible is said to have been the very first of this breed.

Name: Cuckoo Glintstone
Info: Uses FP to produce a magic bolt
Caption:
Lump of broken glintstone enwreathed with magic power. A "faux sorcery" used by the Knights of the Cuckoo. Craftable item.

Launched straight ahead, using FP. A magic bolt springs forth from the point of impact.

Name: Glintstone Scrap
Info: Break gem and use FP to produce a magic bolt
Caption:
Piece of glintstone tinged with unstable magic. Found in crystal tunnels.

Break gem, using FP to produce a magic bolt.

Poor quality and thereby easily broken, a sorcerer wouldn't give it a second look.

Name: Large Glintstone Scrap
Info: Break gem and use FP to produce many magic bolts
Caption:
Large piece of glintstone tinged with unstable magic. Found in crystal tunnels.

Break gem, using FP to produce a magic bolt.

Poor quality and thereby easily broken, a sorcerer wouldn't give it a second look.

Name: Gravity Stone Fan
Info: Uses FP to emit fan-shaped gravitational shockwave
Caption:
Shard of rock found in the wake of a meteorite strike.
It is imbued with a particularly weighty magic.

Uses FP to emit gravitational shockwave.

The desperate ones who scavenge for these shards dub themselves "starcallers."

Name: Gravity Stone Chunk
Info: Uses FP to cause a gravitational explosion
Caption:
Shard of rock found in the wake of a meteorite strike.
It is imbued with a particularly weighty magic.

Throw at enemies, using FP to cause a gravitational explosion.

The desperate ones who scavenge for these shards dub themselves "starcallers."

Name: Wraith Calling Bell
Info: Uses FP to ring bell and calls prowling wraiths
Caption:
Bell used by worshippers of revenants.

Ring bell, using FP to summon prowling wraiths. This can be done multiple times in a row.

Wraiths are said to be the vengeful spirits of those who died when cursed.

Name: Spark Aromatic
Info: Uses FP to scatter sparks in a wide area
Caption:
Art of the perfumers who fought in the Shattering.
Craftable with a perfume bottle.

Uses FP to broadly scatter sparks in a wide arc straight ahead.

Though fire was prohibited to those who served the Erdtree, this rule was forgotten as the war drew ever on.

Name: Poison Spraymist
Info: Uses FP to release poison mist from the mouth
Caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.
Craftable with a perfume bottle.

Uses FP to release a poison mist from user's mouth, causing a buildup of poison.

Perfumed powder is held in the mouth to dissolve before being expelled. It was once a restorative art, or so it is said.

Name: Fire Pot
Info: Throw at enemies to inflict fire damage
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of incendiary materials is sealed inside.

Throw at enemies to inflict fire damage.

Name: Redmane Fire Pot
Info: Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot.
Engraved with the crest of red-maned lion.

Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage.

Even today, the survivors of Radahn's battalion employ fire to stave off the scarlet rot.

Name: Giantsflame Fire Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot.
Enchanted by incantations of the Giants' Flame.

Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage.

Damage scales with faith.

Name: Lightning Pot
Info: Throw at enemies to inflict lightning damage
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of fulminating materials is sealed inside.

Throw at enemies to inflict lightning damage.

Name: Ancient Dragonbolt Pot
Info: Throw at enemies to inflict heavy lightning damage
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot.
Engraved with the crest of the ancient dragon.

Throw at enemies to inflict heavy lightning damage.

Allows one to wield ancient drake lightning regardless of faith. The residual power of relics is a purely natural phenomenon.

Name: Fetid Pot
Info: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of deadly poison
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of effluents is sealed inside. As the mixture ferments, toxins are produced alongside a putrid stench that seeps out once ripe.

Throw at enemies to cause buildup of deadly poison.

Beware though; those who carry these pots will slowly accumulate poison in their own bodies.

Push someone in a privy; expect to get dung on your hands.

Name: Swarm Pot
Info: Throw at enemies to release a swarm of flies
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of effluents is sealed inside.

Throw at enemies to set a swarm of bloodflies upon them. The vile swarm deals damage and builds up onset of blood loss. The cacophony of their wings assails the sanity of berserkers.

The maggots found in waste feed on blood and turn into vicious flies that are pitiably short-lived.

Name: Holy Water Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw at enemies to inflict holy damage.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order.

Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to inflict holy damage.

Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death, even preventing them from rising again.
The Golden Order has no mercy for those who trespass beyond life's bounds.

Name: Sacred Order Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy holy damage.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot.
Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order.

Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy holy damage.

Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death, even preventing them from rising again.
The Golden Order has no mercy for those who trespass beyond life's bounds.

Name: Poison Pot
Info: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of poison
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of poisonous materials is sealed inside.

Throw at enemies to cause buildup of poison.

Name: Roped Fire Pot
Info: Throw behind to inflict fire damage
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of incendiary materials is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.

Throw at rearward enemies to inflict fire damage.

Name: Roped Lightning Pot
Info: Throw behind to inflict lightning damage
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of fulminating materials is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.

Throw at rearward enemies to inflict lightning damage.

Name: Roped Fetid Pot
Info: Throw behind to cause buildup of deadly poison
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of effluents is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.

Throw at rearward enemies to cause buildup of deadly poison.

Beware though; those who carry these pots will slowly accumulate poison in their own bodies.

Push someone in a privy; expect to get dung on your hands.

Name: Roped Poison Pot
Info: Throw behind to cause buildup of poison
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of poisonous materials is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.

Throw at rearward enemies to cause buildup of poison.

Name: Roped Magic Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw behind to inflict magic damage.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of magically resonant materials is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.

Consumes FP. Throw at rearward enemies to inflict magic damage.

Name: Roped Fly Pot
Info: Throw behind to release a swarm of flies
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of effluents is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.

Throw at rearward enemies to release a swarm of flies. Their fangs inflict countless painful lacerations on the victim while the grating sound of their wings assails their sanity.

The maggots found in waste feed on blood and turn into vicious flies that are pitiably short-lived.

Name: Roped Volcano Pot
Info: Creates heat cloud, causing continuous fire damage
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
Powdered volcanic rock is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.

Thrown at rearward enemies to disperse a cloud of heat, dealing continuous damage to those caught inside for a short duration.

Name: Roped Holy Water Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw behind to inflict holy damage.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.

Consumes FP. Throw at rearward enemies to inflict holy damage.

Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death, even preventing them from rising again.
The Golden Order has no mercy for those who trespass beyond life's bounds.

Name: Volcano Pot
Info: Creates heat cloud, causing continuous fire damage
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
Powdered volcanic rock is sealed inside.

Throw at enemies to disperse a cloud of heat, dealing continuous damage to those caught inside for a short duration.

Name: Sleep Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw to cause buildup of sleep.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
Enchanted by the incantations of St. Trina.

Consumes FP. Throw enemies to cause buildup of sleep.

Like a lullaby, or a quagmire, its light-purple haze irresistibly draws its victims down into sleep. Sweet dreams.

Name: Rancor Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw to spawn vengeful spirits.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
Enchanted by the ancient death hex.

Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to spawn vengeful spirits that chase down foes.

In times of old, the dead were burned with ghostflame, and from those cinders arose vengeful spirits.

Name: Magic Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw to inflict magic damage.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of magically resonant materials is sealed inside. Called a "faux sorcery" in Raya Lucaria.

Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to inflict magic damage.

Name: Academy Magic Pot
Info: Uses FP. Throw to inflict heavy magic damage.
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot.
Enchanted by Raya Lucaria sorceries.

Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy magic damage.

This pot, considered a "faux sorcery," was employed to protect the academy.

Name: Freezing Pot
Info: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of frost
Caption:
Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot.
Engraved with the crest of the Carian Royals.

Throw at enemies to cause buildup of frost.

Originates from the cold, dark moon of Ranni, the Carian princess.
